required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Hypoglycemic Effect of Cyclocarya Paliurus Extract on Hyperglycemic Populations
clinical_study.official_title: The Hypoglycemic Effect of Cyclocarya Paliurus Extract on Hyperglycemic Populations

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized double-blind controlled trial，aiming to investigate the hypoglycemic effect of Cyclocarya paliurus extract and Cyclocarya paliurus compounds on hyperglycemic populations without modifying their original treatment plans.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Participants will be divided randomly into three groups，among which the intervention will start and end simultaneously.
study_design_info.masking_description: The allocation of three groups is completed by the primary researcher,and unknown to participants and other reachers. It is the same in the size,color,shape and taste of capsules administrated by three groups.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period
at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period
at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period
at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period
secondary_outcome.description: total cholesterol，high density lipoprotein cholesterol，low density lipoprotein cholesterol，triglyceride

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period

secondary_outcome.measure: changes of short chain fatty acids
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 0 week，4th week and 12th week in the intervention period

arm_group.description: aqueous extract of Cyclocarya paliurus；capsule，2 g/day，2 times/day；3 months

mixed aqueous extract of Cyclocarya paliurus and other traditional Chinese herbal medicines including Astragalus propinquus Schischkin，Dioscorea oppositifolia L.，Dendrobium nobile Lindl.，Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge. and Inulin；capsule，2 g/day，2 times/day；3 months

intervention.description: The participants are divided randomly into three groups，one of which are asked to Cyclocarya paliurus extract for three months .
The participants are divided randomly into three groups，one of which are asked to take Cyclocarya paliurus compounds for three months .
The participants are divided randomly into three groups，one of which are asked to take placebo for three months .

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
